title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Movie Critic Richard Roeper about movies to look out for this summer. Dan discusses Kyrie's decision to opt into his contract with the Nets. Is there still an outside chance he's not there come next season? And, we talk about places that movies/shows have taken place that you'd want to visit. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
